00021 OpxExport::OpxExport(Scene* scene, wxString filename)
00022 {
00023         // asign scene
00024         m_scene = scene;
00025 
00026         // create new outputstream to file
00027         m_outStream = new wxFFileOutputStream(filename);
00028 
00029         // create new zipoutputstream
00030         m_outZip = new wxZipOutputStream(m_outStream);
00031 
00032         // create OpxStream and save to FileSystem
00033         createOpxStream();
00034 }

00042 void OpxExport::createXmlEntry()
00043 {
00044         // temporary string
00045         wxString tmp;
00046 
00047         // local list of assembly pointer
00048         std::list<Assembly*> list;
00049 
00050         // create new empty xml document
00051         wxXmlDocument xml;
00052 
00053         // set xml version
00054         xml.SetVersion(wxT("1.0"));
00055 
00056         // set file encoding
00057         xml.SetFileEncoding(wxT("utf-8"));
00058 
00059         // create root, future root
00060         wxXmlNode* root = new wxXmlNode(wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("opxml"));
00061 
00062         // add property "standard="oaxml.hs-ulm.de""
00063         root->AddProperty(wxT("standard"), wxT("oaxml.hs-ulm.de"));
00064 
00065         // add property "version="0.1.0""
00066         root->AddProperty(wxT("version"), wxT("0.1.0"));
00067 
00068         // add projectInformation
00069         root->AddChild(new wxXmlNode(wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("projectInformation")));
00070 
00071         // node to projectInformation
00072         m_node = root->GetChildren();
00073 
00074         // add name + Project
00075         m_node->AddChild(new wxXmlNode(wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("name")));
00076         m_node = m_node->GetChildren();
00077         m_node->AddChild(new wxXmlNode(wxXML_TEXT_NODE, wxT("name"), wxT("Project")));
00078 
00079         // node to projectInformation
00080         m_node = m_node->GetParent();
00081 
00082         // add author +
00083         m_node->AddChild(new wxXmlNode(wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("author")));
00084         m_node = m_node->GetChildren();
00085         m_node = m_node->GetNext();
00086         m_node->AddChild(new wxXmlNode(wxXML_TEXT_NODE, wxT("author"), wxT("")));
00087 
00088         // node to projectInformation
00089         m_node = m_node->GetParent();
00090 
00091         // node to opxml
00092         m_node = m_node->GetParent();
00093 
00094         // add data
00095         m_node->AddChild(new wxXmlNode(wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("data")));
00096 
00097         // node to projectInformation
00098         m_node = m_node->GetChildren();
00099 
00100         // node to data
00101         m_node = m_node->GetNext();
00102 
00103         // add camera
00104         m_node->AddChild(new wxXmlNode(wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("camera")));
00105 
00106         // node to camera

00108

00111         m_node = m_node->GetChildren();

00113 
00114         // node to camera
00115         m_node = m_node->GetParent();
00116 
00117         // add position

00119 
00120         // node to type
00121         m_node = m_node->GetChildren();
00122 
00123         // node to position
00124         m_node = m_node->GetNext();
00125 
00126         // add location
00127         tmp << m_scene->getGLCamera3D()->getPosition().getX() << wxT(" ") << m_scene->getGLCamera3D()->getPosition().getY() << wxT(" ") << m_scene->getGLCamera3D()->getPosition().getX();
00128         m_node->AddProperty(wxT("location"), tmp);
00129         tmp.Empty();
00130 
00131         // add orientation
00132         tmp << m_scene->getGLCamera3D()->getRotatedX() << wxT(" ") << m_scene->getGLCamera3D()->getRotatedY() << wxT(" ") << m_scene->getGLCamera3D()->getRotatedZ();
00133         m_node->AddProperty(wxT("orientation"), tmp);
00134         tmp.Empty();
00135 
00136         // node to camera
00137         m_node = m_node->GetParent();
00138 
00139         // node to data
00140         m_node = m_node->GetParent();
00141 
00142         // add lightsources
00143         m_node->AddChild(new wxXmlNode(wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("lightsources")));
00144 
00145         // add scene
00146         m_node->AddChild(new wxXmlNode(wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("scene")));
00147 
00148         // node to camera
00149         m_node = m_node->GetChildren();
00150 
00151         // node to lightsources
00152         m_node = m_node->GetNext();
00153 
00154         // node to scene
00155         m_node = m_node->GetNext();
00156 
00157         // get partlist of rootassembly
00158         list = m_scene->getRootAssembly()->getPartList();
00159 
00160         // create scene, add groups and assemblies
00161         createScene(m_node, list);
00162 
00163         // set root
00164         xml.SetRoot(root);
00165 
00166         // create new entry
00167         m_outZip->PutNextEntry(wxT("content.xml"));
00168 
00169         // save xml document to zipstream
00170         xml.Save(*m_outZip);
00171 
00172         // close entry
00173         m_outZip->CloseEntry();
00174 
00175         // detach root
00176         root = xml.DetachRoot();
00177 
00178         // data copied to file, root can be deleted
00179         delete root;
00180 }

00182 void OpxExport::createOpxStream()
00183 {
00184         // wxZipEntry pointer
00185         wxZipEntry* entry;
00186 
00187         // create new xml entry
00188         createXmlEntry();
00189 
00190         // wxFFileInputStream to read lib
00191         wxFFileInputStream inFile((wxFileName::GetCwd() + wxFileName::GetPathSeparator() + wxT("library.gnr")));
00192 
00193         // wxZipInputStream
00194         wxZipInputStream inZip(inFile);
00195 
00196         // vector to store entries
00197         std::vector<wxZipEntry*> vec;
00198 
00199         // vector iterator
00200         std::vector<wxZipEntry*>::iterator vecIt;
00201 
00202         // set iterator
00203         std::set<wxString>::iterator it;
00204 
00205         // get first entry
00206         entry = inZip.GetNextEntry();
00207 
00208         // store all entries
00209         while (entry)
00210         {
00211                 // store into vector
00212                 vec.push_back(entry);
00213 
00214                 // get next entry
00215                 entry = inZip.GetNextEntry();
00216         }
00217 
00218         for (it = m_set.begin(); it != m_set.end(); it++)
00219         {
00220                 for (vecIt = vec.begin(); vecIt != vec.end(); vecIt++)
00221                 {
00222                         if ((*it) == (*vecIt)->GetName())
00223                         {
00224                                 // asign entry
00225                                 entry = *vecIt;
00226 
00227                                 // set name
00228                                 entry->SetName(wxT("assemblies") + wxFileName::GetPathSeparators() + entry->GetName());
00229 
00230                                 // copy data
00231                                 m_outZip->CopyEntry(entry, inZip);
00232 
00233                                 // entry found, leave
00234                                 break;
00235                         }
00236                 }
00237         }
00238 
00239         // close zip file
00240         m_outZip->Close();
00241 }

00243 void OpxExport::createScene(wxXmlNode* node, std::list<Assembly*> list)
00244 {
00245         // iterator
00246         std::list<Assembly*>::iterator it;
00247 
00248         // walk through part list
00249         for (it = list.begin(); it != list.end(); it++)
00250         {
00251                 if ((*it)->getType() == IS_OBJECT || (*it)->getType()== IS_PRIMITIVE)
00252                 {
00253                         // create an assembly entry and add into node
00254                         createAssembly(node, (*it));
00255 
00256                         // insert hash into set
00257                         m_set.insert((*it)->getHash() + wxT(".oax"));
00258 
00259                         // assemby found
00260                         continue;
00261                 }
00262 
00263                 if ((*it)->getType() == IS_GROUP)
00264                 {
00265                         // create an group and add into node
00266                         createGroup(node, (*it));
00267 
00268                         // group found
00269                         continue;
00270                 }
00271         }
00272 }
00273 
00274 void OpxExport::createAssembly(wxXmlNode* node, Assembly* assembly)
00275 {
00276         // temporary string
00277         wxString tmp;
00278 
00279         // add child
00280         node->InsertChild(new wxXmlNode(wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("assembly")), NULL);
00281 
00282         // not to new child
00283         node = node->GetChildren();
00284 
00285         if (assembly->isVisible())
00286         {
00287                 // add hidden
00288                 node->AddProperty(wxT("visible"), wxT("true"));
00289         }
00290         else
00291         {
00292                 // add visible
00293                 node->AddProperty(wxT("visible"), wxT("false"));
00294         }
00295 
00296         // add name
00297         node->AddProperty(wxT("name"), assembly->getName());
00298 
00299         // add location
00300         tmp << assembly->getX() << wxT(" ") << assembly->getY() << wxT(" ") << assembly->getZ();
00301         node->AddProperty(wxT("location"), tmp);
00302         tmp.Empty();
00303 
00304         // add orientation
00305         tmp << assembly->getPhi() << wxT(" ") << assembly->getTheta() << wxT(" ") << assembly->getRho();
00306         node->AddProperty(wxT("orientation"), tmp);
00307         tmp.Empty();
00308 
00309         // add ref
00310         node->AddProperty(wxT("ref"), (assembly->getHash() + wxT(".oax")));
00311 
00312         // node to scene
00313         node = node->GetParent();
00314 }
00315 
00316 void OpxExport::createGroup(wxXmlNode* node, Assembly* assembly)
00317 {
00318         // temporary string
00319         wxString tmp;
00320 
00321         // local list
00322         std::list<Assembly*> list = assembly->getPartList();
00323 
00324         // iterator
00325         std::list<Assembly*>::iterator it;
00326 
00327         // add group
00328         node->InsertChild(new wxXmlNode(wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("group")), NULL);
00329 
00330         // node to new child
00331         node = node->GetChildren();
00332 
00333         if (assembly->isVisible())
00334         {
00335                 // add hidden
00336                 node->AddProperty(wxT("visible"), wxT("true"));
00337         }
00338         else
00339         {
00340                 // add visible
00341                 node->AddProperty(wxT("visible"), wxT("false"));
00342         }
00343         // add name
00344         node->AddProperty(wxT("name"), assembly->getName());
00345 
00346         // add location
00347         tmp << assembly->getX() << wxT(" ") << assembly->getY() << wxT(" ") << assembly->getZ();
00348         node->AddProperty(wxT("location"), tmp);
00349         tmp.Empty();
00350 
00351         // add orientation
00352         tmp << assembly->getPhi() << wxT(" ") << assembly->getTheta() << wxT(" ") << assembly->getRho();
00353         node->AddProperty(wxT("orientation"), tmp);
00354         tmp.Empty();
00355 
00356         // walk through part list
00357         for (it = list.begin(); it != list.end(); it++)
00358         {
00359                 if ((*it)->getType() == IS_OBJECT || (*it)->getType()== IS_PRIMITIVE)
00360                 {
00361                         // create an assembly entry and add into node
00362                         createAssembly(node, (*it));
00363 
00364                         // assemby found
00365                         continue;
00366                 }
00367 
00368                 if ((*it)->getType() == IS_GROUP)
00369                 {
00370                         // create an group and add into node
00371                         createGroup(node, (*it));
00372 
00373                         // group found
00374                         continue;
00375                 }
00376         }
00377 
00378         // node to parent
00379         node = node->GetParent();
00380 }
